resources.string: Currently I am a 3 rd year Computer Science at State Polytechnic of Malang I have developed excellent problem solving skill through my degree, and I implement this skill through my competency in the field of android development My determination and dedication is highlighted by my achievements in competitions and national education programs I love writing code in Kotlin and Java programming languages and quite experienced using SCRUM in my project management With 3 years experience in the field of android development I am now looking to further develop and use my skills in a industry placement, specifically as an Android Developer
